overview.title: A Larger Than Life Experience
overview.text: The 14 cm (5.5 inch) qHD screen of Ascend G730 brings every detail of your world to life. Be it the excitement of a car race or the life like pictures of your loved ones, the large screen of the Ascend G730 shows everything in vivid detail. This screen comes with the 5 point touch feature that takes the user experience to a whole new level.

overview.title: Seize The Moment With Great Clarity
overview.text: The Ascend G730 comes with the dual camera that allows you to seize all your special moments with great clarity. The 5MP AF camera gives you clear pictures even in low lit areas. Special features like face detection and tracking, panorama from four directions, smile shutter and facial beautification add wings to your creativity. For great selfies and flawless video chats you can rely on the 0.3MP secondary camera of the phone.

overview.title: Dual SIM/Dual Standby
overview.text: The Dual SIM/Dual Standby feature of the Huawei Ascend G730 opens up a world of possibilities for you. You can easily manage your professional and personal contacts by using this feature. Now, you can maintain a good work-life balance and at the same time can enhance your communication with people at large.

overview.title: Fastest Downloads
overview.text: The Huawei Ascend G730 uses the latest HSPA+ technology to give your download speeds up to HSPA+ 21 Mbps and upload speed of HSUPA 5.76 Mbps. Be it your favourite video, game or graphics, you can download them at lightning speed.

specification.title: Memory
text: Micro SD Card up to 32 GB

specification.title: Audio
text: Audio: MP3, AAC+, Enhanced AAC etc
